categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Hotshot" was the nickname of a clone cadet member of the Clone Youth Brigade during the Clone Wars.

As the clone cadets took their tour of the Jedi Cruiser Endurance, he and a fellow cadet named Whiplash harassed Boba Fett, who had infiltrated their regiment, using the name "Lucky". He was never very trusting of Boba Fett, which he made very apparent. After Boba Fett sabotaged the Jedi cruiser Endurance he, along with the rest of the Clone Cadets, were sent to the escape pods. Hotshot was in the same escape pod as Boba, along with Jax and Whiplash when Aurra Sing arrived in the Slave I to rescue Boba. Aurra Sing then coldly ordered Boba to jettison Hotshot, Whip, and Jax into deep space.

Hotshot was known to be a trouble maker, at least from the perspective of Jax, as evidenced by the latter ordering him to stand down. He constantly harassed Boba Fett, using the name "Lucky", and was always wary of him.
